# ee-platform Provider

Manage EE Platform resources with terraform

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    ee-platform = {
      source  = "springernature/ee-platform"
      version = "0.0.2"
    }
  }
}

provider "ee-platform" {}
```
